RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 16000. (PLUS UP TO $8,000 THRIF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Weight, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 16 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000, For Each $2,500 To $20,000 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $1 6,000 Or Less Not Considered For Allowances). British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $32,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCKY FORCE broke sharply and tracked the dueling leaders into the backstretch while racing two out from the rail, rallied smartly three wide through the final turn, and finished three wide in the drive to get up in the closing strides. ROCKCLIFFE away well and pressed the pace from the outside of INDTETTA entering the backstretch, forced the issue two wide in the run down the backside, rallied two wide while continuing to challenge for the lead entering the final turn, took a narrow lead in mid stretch, but was unable to hold off LUCKY FORCE in the closing strides. INDYETTA away alertly and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace in the run down the backstretch and through the final turn, and gave way grudgingly in deep stretch in a solid effort. WICKED NIGHT tracked the leaders into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail in the run down the backstretch, rallied from just off the rail entering the final turn, shifted four wide in mid stretch and finished with late interest. TIME TICKER unhurried early while dropping well behind the rest of the field entering the backstretch, commenced his bid from along the inside entering the final turn, and finished five wide in the drive, but was left too much to do.

ENTRY.NAME: Indyetta
ENTRY.OWNER: Albertson Brian and The Estate of Dennis Tucker
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led rail, rallied inside, gave way grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Time Ticker
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, rallied inside, closed 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2 wide, rallied inside, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Force
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked 3 w, rallied 3 w, closed 3 w, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Rockcliffe
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, pressed 2w, rallied 2w, closed 2w, nipped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 14000. (PLUS UP TO $7,000 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 18 Allowed 2 lbs. ; Such A Race Since Then Allowe d 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, For Each $1,750 To $12,500 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered For Allowances). BC Bred Claiming $20,000, Three Year Old $24,000 (BC Bred $30,000). BC Bred Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ADDENDUM broke sharply and tracked the pacesetter into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, engaged the leader two wide entering the final turn, was collared by EBONY EYES entering the lane, but battled back to repel that bid to draw clear late under confident handling. EBONY EYES settled off the early pace while racing one out from the rail entering he backstretch, was asked for run midway down the backstretch and rallied smartly three wide through the final turn, appeared to take the narrowest of advantages into the lane, but was unable to put away a stubborn ADDENDUM, fought fought back from along the inside and drew clear in deep stretch. I'M ALL SHOOK UP away alertly and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, dictated the pace in the run down the backstretch, was quickly tackled by ADDENDUM entering the final turn, was unable to keep tabs on that rival midway through the turn, and faded in the late stages. HOAX ducked in at the start, and unseated her rider. HOAX was pulled up with the assistance of an outrider following the race, and walked off under her own power. Following the running of this race the stewards conducted an inquiry into the start. After review there was no action taken. The final time for this race was hand timed

ENTRY.NAME: Hoax
ENTRY.OWNER: Willow Creek Farms and Chiesa Fabio
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked in start, lost rider

ENTRY.NAME: I'm All Shook Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led rail, rallied inside, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Addendum
ENTRY.OWNER: Freedom Farms Ltd Tom Peter and More Rewards Syndicate
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked 2 w, rallied 2 w, closed 2 w, best

ENTRY.NAME: Ebony Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 2 wide, rallied 3 wide, closed 3 wide, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO $5,500 THRIF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 16 Allowed 2 lbs. ; A Race Since July 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, For Eac h $500 To $3,000 2 lbs. BC Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOMTHING ELUSIVE away alertly and was taken in hand and allowed to settle off the early pace while racing one out from the rail entering the backstretch, commenced his bid two wide entering the final turn, and closed willingly three wide in the drive while drawing clear late. EARS TO US rushed to the lead one out from the rail entering the first turn, raced on a clear lead in the run down the backstretch and through the final turn, drifted out past the middle of the track entering the lane before straightening out, and was outfinished in deep stretch while easily second best. ROAD CLOSURE settled well off the early pacesetter while racing two wide into the backstretch, launched his bid three wide entering the final turn, and closed three wide in the drive , but needed more when called upon. ASKMENOQUESTIONS away well and stalked the pacesetter into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied two wide while chasing the pacesetter into the final turn, but was outfinished in the late going. MILO'S COMMAND broke sharply and was allowed to settle off the early pace while saving ground at the rail entering the backside, rallied two wide entering the final turn, but failed to mount a serious late bid when called upon. EH TEE EM unhurried early while trailing the field into the backstretch, rallied along the inside entering the final turn, and finished from along the rail in the drive, but was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Road Closure
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 2 wide, rallied 3 wide, closed 3 wide, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Somthing Elusive
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, settled 2w, rallied 2w, closed 3w, drew clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Eh Tee Em
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Milo's Command
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, settled rail, rallied 2 wide, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Ears to Us
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, bore out stretch, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Askmenoquestions
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, stalked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 21000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 16 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000, For Each $2,500 To $20,000 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered For Allowances). British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $32,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRETTY ARIA tracked the leaders into the first turn while saving ground at the rail, maintained her position in the run down the backstretch, launched her bid from along the rail entering the final turn, shifted off the rail to split rivals entering the lane, and closed smartly from along the rail in the drive to prove best. VIVA LA VINO unhurried early while dropping back to trail, rallied smartly two wide entering the final turn, and closed full of run four wide in the drive to prove second best. DAPHNE drifted out leaving the first turn while running up on heels, stalked the pacesetter three wide in the run down the backstretch, rallied two wide entering the final turn, and closed determinedly three wide in the drive to hold on for a share. REA MEA settled off the early pace while saving ground at the rail entering the backstretch, continued to save ground through the final turn, and closed with late interest three wide in the drive. BELCARRA PARK away well and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the backside, maintained a narrow lead through the final turn, but faded in the stretch drive. KAPALUA CANDY away alertly and tracked the leader in the run down the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, continued two wide entering he final turn, but weakened over the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Daphne
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Aria
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked rail, rallied inside, closed rail, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Rea Mea
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, rallied rail, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Kapalua Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Viva La Vino
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, rallied 2 wide, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Belcarra Park
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, led rail, rallied inside, late fade

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 56. Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO $5,500 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 16 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, For Each $500 To $3,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STAR FINALITY away alertly and tracked the pacesetter one out from the rail entering the backstretch, set sail after the leader two wide entering the final turn, assumed command midway through the turn, and drew clear late as much the best. PENALTY TO RANGERS broke sharply and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the backstretch, controlled the pace in the run down the backstretch, rallied along the inside entering the final turn, was quickly overtaken midway through the turn, and drew clear in the lane as much the best. DRILL BABY DRILL stalked the leader into the backstretch while saving ground at the rail, rallied two wide entering the final turn, and finished evenly five wide in the drive to garner a share. TEXAS LEGACY settled off the early pace while saving ground at the rail entering the backside, commenced her bid two wide entering the final turn, and finished four wide in the stretch drive. PERFECT PENNY settled well off the early pace while racing three wide entering the backstretch, rallied three wide entering the final turn, but lacked the needed closing response when called upon. AUNTIE J stalked the leader into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, struggled to keep up approaching the final turn, and weakened over the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled rail, rallied 2 wide, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Penny
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 3 wide, rallied 3 wide, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Penalty to Rangers
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led rail, rallied inside, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Drill Baby Drill
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked rail, rallied 2 wide, closed 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Auntie J
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2 wide, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Star Finality
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, led, drew clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 12000. (PLUS UP TO $6,000 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 16 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, For Each $625 To $5,000 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered For Allowances). British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $8,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BELLAROO was off a step slow and settled at the back of a compact field while racing one out from the rail in the run down the backstretch, commenced her bid two wide entering the final turn while briefly awaiting room, tipped five wide entering the lane, and closed with a rush to prove best. LASTING LIGHT broke sharply and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the backstretch, set a pressured pace from the inside of ANAAMY in the run down the backside and into the final turn, got the better of her pace rival leaving the turn, but was unable to fend off the late charge by BELLAROO while drifting out late. RICHARDS COMMAND tracked the leaders in the run down the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied two wide entering the final turn, and battled on determinedly four wide into he drive in a solid effort. QUALITY COMMAND away well and tracked the leaders in the run down the backstretch while saving ground at the rail, rallied smartly from along the inside through the final turn, angled three wide to split rivals in mid stretch, but was forced to take up when losing her path late. ANAAMY away alertly and pressed the pace from the outside of LASTING LIGHT in the run down the backside and through the final turn, was unable to match strides with her pace rival entering the lane, and was outfinished in the stretch drive. HARLAN'S ANGEL went to her knees at the start to get away poorly, rushed into a stalking trip three wide midway down the backstretch, rallied three wide entering the final turn, but faded in the late stages. Following the running of this race there was a jockey's claim of foul, into an incident in mid stretch. The rider of QUALITY COMMAND lodged a claim of foul against the rider of LASTING LIGHT for alleged interference in deep stretch. After review the claim of foul was upheld, and LASTING LIGHT was disqualified from second and placed fourth, for drifting out, and impeding the progress of QUALITY COMMAND.

ENTRY.NAME: Bellaroo
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 5 wide, best

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Lasting Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led rail, rallied inside, closed 2w, drifted late

ENTRY.NAME: Harlan's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, stalked 3 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Anaamy
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressed 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Quality Command
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, tracked inside, rallied rail, closed 3w, steadied 1/16

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 4 wide,
